word: G1999 - ἐπισύστασις - episýstasis - ep-ee-soo'-stas-is - That which cometh upon

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: That which cometh upon
a hostile banding together or concourse
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From the middle of a compound of G1909 and G4921; a conspiracy, that is, concourse (riotous or friendly): - that which cometh upon, + raising up.
